name: Solitaire Duo
description:
If you like Windows Solitaire, you're going to love this app!

The App contains TWO most popular solitaire games in the world: Klondike Solitaire and Spider Solitaire.

Klondike Solitaire - the goal of the game is to place all the cards in each suit in stacks of ascending rank. Play Klondike solitaire to relax and relieve stress. Touch and move cards as you do in real life, cards are flying and landing softly. Clean and vivid graphics make you fully enjoy the game play.

Spider Solitaire is an extremely popular version of Solitaire where your goal is to place all the cards in each suit in stacks of descending suit sequence. This version of Spider Solitaire is just like the version playable on Windows! Weave your way through 1 and 2 suit games and move up in difficulty as you attempt to tackle 3 and 4 suit games and become a true Spider Solitaire master!

The App has the ability to control card movements naturally by just swiping or tapping the cards on your iPhone/iPod touch/iPad.


This is a universal app, playable in the best resolution available for each Apple device.


FEATURES:
-Winning Deals
-Hints
-Klondike
-Spider
-Draw 1 card
-Draw 3 cards
-Custom card backs
-Custom backgrounds
-Unlimited undo
-Standard scoring
-Vegas scoring
-Statistics
